cab.content: OP^A-L^QIlii SECRET,From General Plumer, Italyc To C,IcGeS.v War Office.Despatched 10 p*mc 21,12ol!70 Received 10,45 a,m, 22^12,1700.143* December 21st,I have been to-day visited by Commander cf 4th Army and the Corps Commanders of that Army under whose .direction yesterday^s operations were carried out-.They were well, pleased with the result obtainedeThe ground regained is not extensive nor except in the case of Mt. Asolore very material; the important point however is tnat the Italians did carry cut an organised attack and that it succeeded.There has been no change so far to-day.
